project_abstract.cdata: The Shanghai Environment Project supports achievement of a sustainable environment for the long-term economic and social development of Shanghai, while providing a competitive framework for industrial growth. In particular, the project will focus on improving and protecting drinking water quality and controlling pollution. The main components would comprise: (a) construction of a major raw water supply intake, pump stations, multibarrel supply main, improvements to existing water treatment facilities and distribution network; (b) engineering protection measures in the Upper Huangpu River Catchment; (c) wastewater collection and treatment in Songjiang Town; (d) construction of a water quality monitoring facility; (e) investments in mechanical plant and civil works to improve solid waste, nightsoil and hazardous wastes collection and disposal; and (f) technical assistance and training, including preparation of a water supply master plan, geographic information systems development in support of planning and the Shanghai Reform Action Plan, water supply management and environmental monitoring, institutional strengthening, feasibility studies and future project preparation.

P003586.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>上海环境项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目支持实现环境可持续发展，促进上海市经济社会长期发展，同时为工业增长提供参照框架。本项目将尤其重视改善饮用水质量，保护饮用水源，控制污染。项目的主要内容包括：（1）修建大型原水供应取水口、泵站和由多个管道组成的供水主管，改造现有水处理设施和配水网络；（2）在黄浦江流域上游实施工程性保护措施；（3）在松江大学城修建污水收集和处理设施；（4）修建供水水质监测设施；（5）投资建设机械厂和土建工程，加强垃圾、粪便和有害废物收集和处置；（6）提供技术援助和培训，包括编制供水总体规划、建立支持规划工作和上海市改革行动计划的地理信息系统、开展供水管理、环境监测、机构加强、可行性研究以及今后项目准备等工作。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
